thread.title: Vishakha plays a ghost in her next horror film
thread.title_full: Vishakha plays a ghost in her next horror film - The Times of India

author: Janani Karthik
title: Vishakha plays a ghost in her next horror film
text:
Vishakha Singh is currently working in a horror film titled Bayam Oru Payanam. We hear that the actress is playing a ghost in the film. This horror film is a female-oriented subject that has Vishakha and Meenakshi Dikshit playing female leads. This film directed by debutant Mani Sharma has Bharath Reddy as the male lead.
Talking about the film, Mani Sharma says, "The film is nearing completion with just a few scenes left to be shot. So far we have shot the film in Munnar. The entire film will be shot only here. Vishakha has done an interesting role as a ghost. Though it is a heroine-oriented script, Barath plays a crucial role in this horror film."
